name: Cave Dragon Wyrmling
movement: walk 20 ft., fly 20 ft., burrow 30 ft.
description: A medium-sized dragon with scales that may blend into dark environments, showcasing a combination of physical prowess and innate magical abilities.
memorable: Its ability to suppress light creates chaos for enemies while it can navigate through the earth with ease.
goals: To ambush prey and control territory in dark cave systems.
relations: Can be encountered alone or in groups, often territorial and aggressive towards intruders.
environment: Typically found in dark caves or underground environments.
strengths: Immunity to poison damage and conditions, effective ambusher with blindsight and tremorsense.
weaknesses: Low Intelligence limits strategic complexity; vulnerable to clever maneuvers due to its reliance on stealth and darkness.
attacks: Melee bite attack that inflicts piercing and poison damage; area control via Poison Breath attack.
most_powerful_ability: Darkness Shroud - creates zones of magical darkness around it, hindering enemies.
senses: Has blindsight and tremorsense, allowing it to perceive its surroundings in total darkness.
skills: Skilled in Perception and Stealth, making it proficient in ambush tactics.
additional_information: Can suppress light to manipulate battlefield visibility.
Possesses magical tunneling capabilities for strategic movement.
Has both a melee and ranged attack option with poison.
Highly mobile with the ability to burrow undetected.
A powerful foe for low-level adventurers due to its tactical abilities.
test_queries: cave dwelling dragon with magical abilities
